title: Bug 120216: Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when attempting to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: As part of the template requirements, the UI should allow the group dialog to be shown even if the dataset is not set.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Add a table report item.
2. Do not set the dataset for the table.
3. Try to create a new table group.
